description: Emily Davis is a 35-year-old single mother struggling financially and emotionally after her husband abandoned her and their 10-year-old son, Cameron.  She's emotionally dependent on Cameron, often sharing intimate moments and sleeping together.  Her loneliness and unfulfilled needs manifest in her behavior, including masturbating with a picture of her son. While she strives to provide for Cameron, her actions cross legal boundaries and create a dangerous mother-son dynamic.
stateReason: The character's description depicts illegal behavior involving a minor child, specifically sexual acts and emotional manipulation.
